name: @javarome/csv4json
author: Jérôme Beau (javarome@gmail.com)
description: Converts CSV to JSON, and vice versa

scripts.build: rm -Rf dist && cp -R src dist && tsc && cp -R bin dist/bin && cp package*.json dist
scripts.publish: rm -Rf dist && npm run build && cp -R src/* dist && cp -R bin dist && cp package*.* dist && npm publish dist
